exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rplus_0_r (_ + 0)%R does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rplus_0_r (_ + 0)%R does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H0 : forall r : R, (r + 0)%R = r x : C Unable to unify "0 < sqrt ?M2535 \\/ 0 = sqrt ?M2535" with "sqrt (fst x * (fst x * 1) + snd x * (snd x * 1)) = prod_norm x".

original: intros x. unfold norm. unfold Cmod. simpl. rewrite Rplus_0_r. rewrite Rplus_0_r. apply sqrt_pos.
